resources.string: Swipe up to open app drawer

RiProG Launcher v3.0.0

An ultra-lightweight, high-performance Android launcher designed for simplicity and speed.

CORE FEATURES
• Minimal RAM & CPU Footprint
• Premium Liquid Glass UI Aesthetic
• Efficient App Drawer with Search
• Alphabetical Quick Navigation Bar
• Advanced Widget Selection UI
• Precision Freeform Layout Support
• Seamless Icon & Label Scaling
• Full Material Design Theme Integration

PROJECT RESOURCES
GitHub: https://github.com/RiProG-id/RiProG-Launcher-App
Telegram: https://t.me/RiOpSo
Telegram Group: https://t.me/RiOpSoDisc

FREE SUPPORT

Arahlink: https://arahlink.id/WAUR
Enable premium transparent glass effects with blur and adaptive tints.
Apply a subtle dark overlay to the wallpaper in dark mode to improve contrast.
Enable free movement, rotation, and scaling. Items can overlap and move without grid constraints.
Completely hide labels for apps and folders on the home screen for a cleaner look.
Uniformly adjust the size of icons and labels across the home screen and app drawer.
RiProG Launcher works best when set as your primary home application.
